com.googlecode.lanterna.gui

Class DefaultBackgroundRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.DefaultBackgroundRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIScreenBackgroundRenderer

    public class DefaultBackgroundRenderer
extends Object
implements GUIScreenBackgroundRenderer
    A default background renderer implementation that draws the background as a solid color and, if set, prints a title and the JVM memory usage.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultBackgroundRenderer()
      Solid-color background with no title
      DefaultBackgroundRenderer(String title)
      Solid-color background with user-specified title

      void drawBackground(TextGraphics textGraphics) 
      String getTitle() 
      boolean isShowingMemoryUsage() 
      void setShowMemoryUsage(boolean showMemoryUsage)
      If true, will display the current memory usage in the bottom right corner, updated on every screen refresh
      void setTitle(String title)
